title: "What tha Font?"
content:
Could anyone help with these displays Another Magazine had used before redesign. See attachment.

[http://typophile.com/node/37967](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108184602/http:/typophile.com/node/37967 "http://typophile.com/node/37967")

I only have info on the creators - Buero New York...  
Help needed badly.
author: onki

comments.content: I believe this is “Fashion Thin” by Alex Wiederin.

Yep. That's the one. Check out this prior thread:

[http://typophile.com/node/20952](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108184602/http:/typophile.com/node/20952 "http://typophile.com/node/20952")

too bad it is=)))... here in Moscow we do experience some budget troubles with converting typefaces to cyrillic... it would be nice to buy a latin version and save some money on "into cyrillic" process... and it's too expensive to build a font with no latin digital base... not for this project, pitty. thanks, guys.
